TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CheckoutException extends System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program is canceled or fails.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates throwing a CheckoutException.
[!code-vb[CheckoutExceptionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._0_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[CheckoutExceptionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CheckoutExceptionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._0_1.cs)]

Initializes a new instance of the class that specifies that the check out was canceled. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This exception occurs if the user selects `Cancel` on the checkout dialog box.
